comments.text: Since bug 1577760, the -V (version) and -H (channel) switches are no longer optional, so make_incremental_update.sh and make_full_update.sh can no longer be run successfully without $MOZ_PRODUCT_VERSION and $MAR_CHANNEL_ID set. It's a little irritating to only discover this after all the diff generation has gone through in make_incremental_update, which takes several minutes, so I'll submit a patch to fail early if they are not provided.
comments.raw_text: Since bug 1577760, the -V (version) and -H (channel) switches are no longer optional, so make_incremental_update.sh and make_full_update.sh can no longer be run successfully without $MOZ_PRODUCT_VERSION and $MAR_CHANNEL_ID set. It's a little irritating to only discover this after all the diff generation has gone through in make_incremental_update, which takes several minutes, so I'll submit a patch to fail early if they are not provided.
comments.creator: agashlin+bz@gmail.com
